      Brief Prints the colored workersBoard together with others info
      Parameters:
      workersBoard - contains all the workers placed on the board
      buildingLevels - are the levels of all the buildings in the map
      validPositions - are the optional positions to display

      Brief Prints the coordinates only for the workers' placement phase
      Parameters:
      workersBoard - contains all the workers placed on the board
      row - is the row in the map
      col - is the column in the map
      cellHeight - is the chosen cellHeight
      cellWidth - is the chosen cellWidth

    • areAllWorkerPlaced

      private static boolean areAllWorkerPlaced​(java.lang.String[][] workersBoard)
      Parameters:
      workersBoard - contains all the workers placed on the board
      Returns:
      true if the game is still in placement phase

      Brief Prints a cell at a certain board's position

      worker - is the worker's symbol
      building - is the building's symbol
      validPositions - are the positions the worker can move to
      cellPosition - is the element of communication
      row - is the row in the map
      col - is the column in the map
      height - is the height of the map
      width - is the width of the map

      Brief Prints the right borders for the board just like it's being "smoothed"
      Parameters:
      row - is the row in the map
      col - is the column in the map
      width - is the width of the map
      height - is the height of the map
      rowInterval - is the interval of rows to skip
      columnInterval - is the interval of columns to skip
